DOC.brief_title: Unequal Placental Sharing Monochorionic Diamniotic Twins : Observational Study
DOC.detailed_description: In cohort , serial ultrasound perform pregnancy . MRI offer pregnancy . After delivery , placental examination perform . In unselected MCDA twin , investigator assess relationship unequal placental share risk fetal neonatal loss . The investigator also establish whether umbilical vein measurement MRI use predict placental sharing . In case complicate twin-to-twin transfusion syndrome ( TTTS ) , investigator look association unequal placental share intrauterine fetal demise laser surgery . In case complicate selective intra-uterine growth restriction ( sIUGR ) , relationship unequal placental share risk fetal neonatal loss birth prior 34 week assess . Furthermore , data neurological outcome 2 year age cohort collect .
